DOC.brief_summary: Dr. Atkins ' New Diet Revolution sell 10 million copy New York Times best seller list 158 week . This low-carbohydrate diet , ZONE , Sugar Busters , Carbohydrate Addicts Diet , attract much popular attention little scientific evaluation . Given widespread use diet , seem prudent evaluate safety efficacy . Therefore , purpose study compare effectiveness two different weight control program course 52 week . These two program 1 ) Atkins ' New Diet Revolution , low-carbohydrate , high-protein diet , 2 ) Brownell 's LEARN Program , high carbohydrate , low fat diet base behavior modification . Specifically , study compare short-term change weight , food intake , blood chemistry mood adult male ( n=10 ) female ( n=10 ) randomize either Atkins ' Diet LEARN Program period one year . During year , medical supervision . We examine effect two weight loss plan change lipid , blood pressure , insulin sensitivity ketone , eat behavior . This feasibility study thus data ultimately use design large randomize trial adequate statistical power .
